title: Panic when running slasher benchmark
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description When running the slasher benchmark I get a `panic: assignment to entry in nil map` The line mentioned in the stack accesses the map `latestEpochWrittenForValidator` in the slasher service. As the tests and the benchmark do not create the service with `New` they do not initialise all fields. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? I guess. I don't know ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ``` cd beacon-chain/slasher go test -bench=. ``` ## üî• Error 

panic: assignment to entry in nil map

goroutine 195 [running]:
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher.(*Service).checkSlashableAttestations(0xc0000e0680, {0x1a3a768, 0xc0000400c0}, 0x1, {0xc00030a000, 0x1, 0x1})
        /home/leo/src/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher/detect_attestations.go:48 +0xdc5
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher.runAttestationsBenchmark(0xc00035c480, 0xc0000e0680, 0x1, 0x1)
        /home/leo/src/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher/detect_attestations_test.go:890 +0x205
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher.BenchmarkCheckSlashableAttestations.func1(0xc00035c480?)
        /home/leo/src/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher/detect_attestations_test.go:826 +0x3e
testing.(*B).runN(0xc00035c480, 0x1)
        /usr/lib/go-1.18/src/testing/benchmark.go:193 +0x102
testing.(*B).run1.func1()
        /usr/lib/go-1.18/src/testing/benchmark.go:233 +0x59
created by testing.(*B).run1
        /usr/lib/go-1.18/src/testing/benchmark.go:226 +0x9c
exit status 2
FAIL    github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/slasher     0.060s
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
   Ubuntu 22.04 on AMD64
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
    develop branch
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** No
